name: AB Tech Solution
tag_list: embedded, firmware, software, fieldbus, hvac, robotics, medical-devices, sensors, industrial-automation, building-automation, green-energy-
overview:
Engineers at AB Tech Solution are experts in the design of embedded systems. Our hardware and firmware engineers will work with your team or we will be your team to develop successful embedded systems for your customer. And we will do this all being on time and within your budget. We will help you select components, design the hardware, implement the necessary software or firmware, and will even design the printed circuit board or you.

The engineers at AB Tech Solution have experience in 8- to 32-bit microprocessors from all manufacturers. We have expertise in all major programming languages, especially languages like C and C++, and we can even design, if necessary, a PC-based program to complement or control your embedded design.
